message: Take it or leave it, Bob. I'm feeling generous today.
Meet me halfway, Alice. No need to be greedy.
I'm still feeling generous, Bob. But let's be realistic, I'm not going to give you half. Accept this, and we both get something. Reject it, and we might both end up with nothing.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. Meet me in the middle of the middle.
Bob, we're running out of time. My offer is final. Take it, or we both get nothing.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not going to let you take advantage of me now.
Bob, this is my last offer. I'm willing to give you a thousand dollars, but I need the rest.  This is our last chance to get anything at all.
You're not getting the best of me, Alice. This is my final offer.
Bob, we're almost out of time. I'm giving you a chance to get something, but you need to accept this offer. It's not much, but it's better than nothing.
You're really pushing your luck, Alice. This is my last chance to get a decent share.
Bob, we're down to the wire. This is my final offer. Take it, or we both get nothing.
Fine, Alice. We're out of time. I'll take what I can get. This is my last and final offer.
